title: New: The 1975 – Girls
content:
The second post on The 1975 in as many days, and anticipation is peaking ahead of the release of their debut LP on Monday.

Girls, one of the album’s finest moments, was played on Radio 1 last night, and gives a taster of what’s to follow next week. Surely the next single from the record, it’s gloriously upbeat, and centred around one of those tell-tale 1975 hooks that have helped them on their rise to fame. Check out Girls below, as well as Influences with The 1975, in which Matt talks through some of the driving inspirations behind their LP.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
